thread.title: BRIEF-Cohen & Steers Announces Preliminary Assets Under Management And Net Flows For January 2018

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Cohen & Steers Announces Preliminary Assets Under Management And Net Flows For January 2018

organizations.name: brief-cohen & steers announces preliminary assets under management

text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Cohen & Steers Inc:
* COHEN & STEERS ANNOUNCES PRELIMINARY ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT AND NET FLOWS FOR JANUARY 2018
* COHEN & STEERS INC - REPORTED PRELIMINARY ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT OF $61.3 BILLION AS OF JANUARY 31, 2018, A DECREASE OF $825 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
